subs.text: The ongoing saga of Bull Mancuso, waste management consultant in NJ. My co-author is ChatGPT.
When "ChatGPT" doesn't know something it just lies.

Podcasting is for places your eyes are doing other important things. Driving, walking, running, watching stuff. This is why YouTube is not a great place to serve podcasts from. The positioning is wrong. YouTube requires use of your eyes. I know it's not technically a requirement, rather it's a positioning thing. I wouldn't serve dinner from a baseball glove even though technically I could.
As a writer, these are the features I want all social media apps to support. It's a good time to be thinking about this.
